name: Sarthak Agrawal
bio:
I am a full-stack developer with experience in building applications from scratch to the production level.  
 
Feel free to DM/mail (sarthakagrawal927@gmail.com) for any software-intensive cool projects.

pastexp.title: SWE : Fullstack Developer
pastexp.description: Tech Stack : NodeJS, ReactJS, Kafka, Redis, ElasticSearch, Docker, Golang, GCP, MySQL.

pastexp.title: SWE : Frontend Developer
pastexp.description:
- Created Frontend Web Applications from scratch using ReactJS, Redux, MUI, Framer-Motion & Cypress.
- Actively contributed towards the NodeJS backend of the application.

pastexp.title: Prism Research Intern
pastexp.description:
- Designed & implemented the solution to the problem of stitching multiple videos into a panoramic view in real-time.
- Worked on multiple algorithms provided by OpenCV and made Electron-based GUI for easy access.

Tech Stack - Python, OpenCV, ElectronJS

pastexp.title: SDE : Full Stack Developer
pastexp.description:
- Worked on the Streamer app that aims to solve healthcare problems using facial recognition. Managed the project from ideation to development. 
- Translated requirements from UI prototypes into a web portal with ReactJS. Built REST API backend using NodeJS.

Tech Stack - ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB.

education.activities:
- Head of Web Development at multiple college bodies ( ADG & MTTN )
- Lead teams of junior developers towards building multiple full-stack web applications.
- Conducted multiple events in the field of Computer Science & Psychology.

projects.title: EasyLOR
projects.description: An end-to-end web application built using Next.js, Typescript, GraphQL and Prisma with PostgreSQL as database to streamline the process of LOR applications at our university.

projects.title: GitTinder
projects.description: A web application aiming to connect developers across various to domain to collaborate and share ideas. Made with React, Redux and NodeJS

projects.title: Streamer App
projects.description: An Android/iOS/Web app that aims to solve healthcare problems due to the COVID pandemic in educational institutions. Managed the project from ideation to development. Translated requirements from UI prototypes into a web portal with ReactJS. Built REST API backend using NodeJS.

projects.title: Flash Survey
projects.description: Simple MERN stack project for creating surveys, uses Google Auth, Stripe & Sendgrid APIs

volunteer.description:
- Core Member of category responsible for making all the web portals for smooth functioning of the national technical fest, of MIT, Manipal aka Tech Tatva '20.
- Mentored juniors to help them reach their potential in styling of web applications.
